I don't know much about non-Microsoft apps, but you can use Windows display settings to increase the size of most apps on your PC's display.

Select Start Windows logo Start button > SettingsGear-shaped Settings icon > Ease of Access > Display. To make everything larger, including images and apps, choose an option from the drop-down menu under Make everything bigger.

If you continue to experience issues with a non-Microsoft app, reach out to the software developer directly.
